        static java.security.PublicKey generatePublicKeyOutOfPubKeyString(java.lang.String pubKey)
        generate RSA key with the provided base64 encoded string

        Returns:

      • encryptChallenge

        public static byte[] encryptChallenge(java.lang.String challenge,
                                      java.lang.String pubKey)
        encrypt the provided challenge with the pubKey generated out of the provided pubKey string
        Parameters:
        challenge - challenge that needs to be encrypted
        pubKey - string of the decoded JWK
        Returns:
        byte-array of the encrypted challenge, null if error occurred
